overview: Doro is young, beautiful and a trained opera singer that gets by with occasional jobs. Her neighbour, a former criminal detective, is dying and she cares for him in his last moments. His dying wish is to see his son Michael. Doro fulfills the old man's wish and they meet for the first time since twenty years.
tagline: "You stay for 6 weeks and I'll try to die meanwhile."
title: Meine schöne Nachbarin
